Plot: Written in a simple, captivating and engaging style, the book follows the path of Max, an ex-military captain who became a captain of good deeds. Leaving a chequered life in the military where he had risen to the rank of a captain while still relatively young, Max becomes an inspiration to many and on top of it crosses the racial barrier to fall madly in love with Michelle Catalane, the girl from America he fell in love with at first sight while still in active duty.
